 MUNICIPAL COURT

Municipal Court
---------------

**![StHedwig-30 - Copy](https://sainthedwigcity.com/StHedwig-30%20-%20Copy.jpg?t=202507151307160)Saint Hedwig Municipal Court**  
**Judge:**  Dee Grimm, RN, JD  
**Prosecutor:** Cynthia Trevino  
**Court Clerk:** Melissa Vick

**[Pay Your Citation By Clicking Here](https://govpay.net/saint-hedwig-tx-municipal-court)**

  
  
  
For more information, Please call City Hall at 210-667-9568  
or Email the Court Clerk at: [Court@sainthedwigcity.com](mailto:court@sainthedwigcity.com)  

**Court is held the third Wednesday of each month, at 1:00 P.M., unless otherwise noted.**   
**\*\*Pre-Trials, Show Cause & Pre-Warrant Hearings will be held at 2:00 pm on the third Wednesday of each month\*\***  
  
**Court Date - February 18, 2026**  
**At 1:00 pm**  
**[Docket](https://sainthedwigcity.com/St%20Hedwig%20Court%20Docket%202-18-2026.pdf?t=202601281631040)**

  
  
  
**\*NEW FEATURE EFFECTIVE 10/27/2025\* TEXT ALERTS FOR DELINQUENT CASES  
         ![Linebarger Text Alert 04282025](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Linebarger%20Text%20Alert%2004282025.jpg?t=202510221130560)****Payments:**  
The Saint Hedwig Municipal Court accepts the following types of payment:  
Cash, Check**\***, Money Orders**\***, Cashier's Check**\***, Credit/Debit Cards**\*\***  
 **\***Make payable to the City of Saint Hedwig.  No personal checks will be accepted for cases in WARRANT STATUS.  
**\*\*** There is a processing fee on all credit and debit card transactions.   
You can pay your citation in the following ways:  
In Person:  Payments can be made at the window during normal business hours  
Online:  **PAYMENTS CAN BE MADE ONLINE** **AT:** <https://govpay.net/saint-hedwig-tx-municipal-court>  
Mail:      Saint Hedwig Municipal Court                                            
              P.O. Box 40                                                                                                                                                                             
              Saint Hedwig, TX 78152  
**Saint Hedwig Municipal Court does not accept any cash in the mail**  
**Court Guidelines**  

* The Saint Hedwig Municipal Court does not give legal advice.
* Please allow 3 to 5 business days for the court to process your citation.
* A telephone call does not constitute a court appearance.
* Juveniles under the age of 17 at the time of the offense are required                                                                                                                      by law to appear in person with a parent or legal guardian before the court.
* No weapons, cameras, recording devices or any other electronic equipment allowed in the courtroom.
* No food, drink or tobacco products allowed in the courtroom.
* No tank tops, halter tops, muscle shirts or T-shirts with indecent, obscene or profane words or language, graphics, or illustrations allowed in the courtroom.
* No caps, hats, or bandanas allowed in the courtroom.
* No Use of obscene or profaned language will be tolerated.
* All cell phones, beepers, pagers, and all other communication devices must be                                                                                                turned off before entering the courtroom.

  
**Helpful Links**  
[TDLR Alcohol and Drug Courses](https://www.tdlr.texas.gov/court-ordered/drug-and-alcohol/search/?type=AEPM)                                  [Approved TDLR Driving Safety Course](https://search.tdlrapproved.com/)  
[Tobacco Awareness Program](https://www.dshs.texas.gov/tobacco/about-tobacco-use-control/texas-youth-tobacco-awareness)                                       [State driving Record](https://txapps.texas.gov/tolapp/txldrcdr/TXDPSLicenseeManager)  
[Texas Driver's License Information](https://www.dps.texas.gov/section/driver-license)                               [Texas Department of Motor Vehicles - Registration](https://www.txdmv.gov/)
